description:
Nagisa is in the middle of a championship game with her lacrosse team when Juna, the dark warrior from Dotsuku Zone pulls her away along with Honoka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Makenai tte ba!! Yami no Chikara o Buttobase!
We Won`t Lose!! Blow the Power of Darkness Away!
ไม่มีวันยอมแพ้หรอก พลังแห่งความมืดจงหายไปซะ
負けないってばー!! 闇の力をぶっとばせ!
